greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = product of n successive numbers up to n, if n is odd a(n) = n*(n-1)*.. = n!,if n is even a(n) = n(n+1)(n+2)... 'n' terms.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..350
mathematica: n = 1; anfunc[n_] := (If [EvenQ[n], {an = n, Do[an = an*(n + i), {i, n - 1}]}, an = n! ]; an) Table[anfunc[n], {n, 1, 30}] - Elizabeth A. Blickley (Elizabeth.Blickley(AT)gmail.com), Mar 10 2006
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Nov 03 2005
ext: More terms from Elizabeth A. Blickley (Elizabeth.Blickley(AT)gmail.com), Mar 10 2006
